text: namut (salataye velava pæmina, saturan adi kumak ho yamkisi karanavak nisa ekama sthanayaka nævati salat kirimata) oba biya vuvahot gaman karamin ho nætahet vahanaya mata hindimin ho (salat karanu). tavada (obage biya paha vi) oba biyen tora keneku bavata pat vuvahot oba nodænuvatva tibunu dæya (salatayan) ohu obata uganva dun andamata (salat kara) allahva dikr karanu
